channel.title: How to make admins be able to trade?
channel.description:
On my delta server admins, co owners, and owners can not trade. How can I make it so they CAN?
Thanks.

item.title: How to make admins be able to trade?
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Go into Client.java, and search for the message you get when you try to trade.
You should see something like “If PlayerRights == 2” change the 2 to a random Player Right like 8 or something.
That’s what I did when I couldn’t drop anything.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make admins be able to trade?
